items.title: What is Moments?
items.answer: Moments is a platform that allows you to create memories of special moments for yourself, whether with friends, a girlfriend/boyfriend, spouse, or family. You can add photos, a special message, and a live counter that shows how long this relationship has lasted.

items.title: How can I create a personalized page on Moments?
items.answer: To create a personalized page, fill out the form with the moment's name, the date it happened, a message, and select up to 5 photos. Then click the 'Create Moment' button and complete the payment.

items.title: What's included in my personalized page?
items.answer: Your personalized page will include a live counter showing how long this memory has lasted, a photo slideshow, and a special message for the moment. Additionally, there will be emojis falling on each photo.

items.title: How do I receive my personalized page after payment?
items.answer: After completing the payment, you will receive a QR code to share with someone special and a link via email to access your page.

items.title: Can I edit my page after creating it?
items.answer: Yes. Once you receive the link to your page, it will include an editing section that you can use to make changes.

items.title: What is the cost to create a page on Moments?
items.answer: Currently, the cost to create a page on Moments is only $19.00 for the basic version and $39.99 for the advanced version.

items.title: How long does it take to receive the QR code via email?
items.answer: Payments via pix and credit card are processed instantly. Payments via bank slip may take 1 to 3 business days to clear.

items.title: What are the payment methods?
items.answer: Currently, we accept payments via pix, bank slip, and credit card.

items.title: How can I contact customer support?
items.answer: You can contact our customer support via email at suporte@moments.com.br.
